title: My RP disappeared!  Please help
body: Way to much RP disappeared after I purchased the champion Karma. I didn't do all the math, but it looks like the amount that disappeared is the same amount I got for refunding Vel'koz. Who I just refunded minutes before.  Please help me get that RD back. I'm trying to use it for rune pages when they're on sale. Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey Eventide123,

It looks like everything processed properly on our side. You were charged 790 RP for Karma. This may have been a visual error. How much RP do you see on your side?
